text: The Witcher is a fantasy series of short stories and novels by Polish writer Andrzej Sapkowski. The Witcher may also refer to other works based on the stories by Andrzej Sapkowski: * The Hexer (film), also known as The Witcher in English, a 2001 Polish fantasy film * The Hexer (TV series), also known as The Witcher in English, a 2002 Polish fantasy television series * The Witcher (TV series), a 2019 American fantasy television series * The Witcher (video game series) ** The Witcher (video game), a 2007 action role-playing game developed by CD Projekt Red and published by Atari
title: The Witcher (disambiguation)
